response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe will significantly benefit your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $14,000. This represents a substantial savings compared to the market rate and a unique opportunity to acquire a high-value asset at a competitive price. I trust this offer will meet your expectations and align with your financial planning. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 14000}
